title: Tariq Fazal calls for political unity to address national challenges
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 22 (APP):Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N), senior leader Tariq Fazal Chaudhry on Monday said that political leaders must acknowledge the gravity of the situation and unite for the greater good.
It is imperative that political leaders step forward to mitigate the prevailing uncertainty, he said that while talking to a private news channel.
He highlighted the importance of setting aside political differences to address the nation’s pressing issues. “We must work together to prevent any significant damage to the country,” he added.
He said that PML-N was ready to engage in dialogue with all parties including the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf (PTI). The senior PML-N leader called for an end to the current atmosphere of uncertainty, warning that any prolonged or exacerbated crises could lead to severe national repercussions.
Answering a question, he said that combating terrorism transcends political affiliations. He further said that every Pakistani was supporting our brave forces in their mission to eradicate the menace of terrorism.
